name: Save new Bitrix24 contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in Bitrix24, Make will automatically add that contact to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Cby1ZdDMDDdUTwtuefPPGnzd3WJVuMCyCg4OK33I_Bo/edit?usp=sharing).
